description: Creates an authorizer. Requires permission to access the CreateAuthorizer action.

parameters.name: authorizerFunctionArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the authorizer's Lambda function.

parameters.name: tokenSigningPublicKeys
parameters.description: The public keys used to verify the digital signature returned by your custom authentication service. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the custom authorizer. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

parameters.name: enableCachingForHttp
parameters.description: When true, the result from the authorizer's Lambda function is cached for clients that use persistent HTTP connections. The results are cached for the time specified by the Lambda function in refreshAfterInSeconds. This value does not affect authorization of clients that use MQTT connections. The default value is false.
